list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor logging, grouping, and chunk processing logic
Streamlined grouping by removing redundant fields, enhanced logging with detailed chunk info, and eliminated unnecessary checks in chunk processing. Improved docstring for search method to clarify returned structure.

MESSAGE.value:
Integrate Anthropic API.
This update includes replacing OpenAI with Anthropic Claude for document optimization, adding support for document labels, and implementing conflict-resolution logic for database inserts. Additional changes include schema updates, enhanced chunk handling, and a switch to Anthropic for the embedding and optimization pipeline.

Enhance document search and chunk processing features
Add `title`, `url`, and `labels` to search results for richer context. Improve logging for chunk processing and handle stale chunk deletion. Simplify chunk generation by removing unnecessary complexity and warnings.

Refactor logging, grouping, and chunk processing logic
Streamlined grouping by removing redundant fields, enhanced logging with detailed chunk info, and eliminated unnecessary checks in chunk processing. Improved docstring for search method to clarify returned structure.

Add classification field to documents and optimize logging
Introduced a new "classification" field in the documents table and integrated it into related queries, model, and optimization logic. Updated logging levels for better granularity and added timing for document optimization. Minor adjustments include stricter checks and cleanup of redundant operations.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Add classification field to documents and optimize logging
Introduced a new "classification" field in the documents table and integrated it into related queries, model, and optimization logic. Updated logging levels for better granularity and added timing for document optimization. Minor adjustments include stricter checks and cleanup of redundant operations.
